resource.name: National Historic Districts

resource.name: Police Calls for Service December 2020 to Year to Date
resource.description: This dataset contains Police Calls for Service from December 2020 to Year to Date. The addresses have been generalized to block level and offset to protect the privacy of our residents.  Incidents involving sensitive call types have had the addressing removed. Those include: Assist Medical, Child Abandonment, Child Abuse Report, Death, Harassing Communication, Police - Overdose, Police - Suicide, Rape, Sexual Abuse Report, Terroristic Threatening and Vacation Home Report.  All call data posted is preliminary and therefore, the data may change upon further investigation.
columns_description: Time the first unit assigned to the call arrived at the scene of the incident
Time the first unit was assigned to the call
The time that the first police unit that indicated they were en route to the call arrived at the incident location.
Time the first police unit indicated they were en route to the incident

Date and Time the Call For Service was inserted into CAD
The time that the first police unit dispatched to the incident indicated they had arrived at the incident location
Time the first police unit indicated they had arrived at the scene

resource.name: Annexations
resource.description: This dataset contains the Geographic Information Systems (GIS) data for the City of Little Rock Annexation boundaries.

resource.name: Down Payment Assistant Program
resource.description: This dataset contains a list of the homes that the City has provided down payment assistance for purchase. The City of Little Rock has allocated funds to assist low and moderate income first time homebuyers to purchase owner occupancy residential properties within the city limits. Applicants must be pre-approved by a lender. The program funds are provided by HUD through the HOME Investment Partnership Program.
columns_description: Amount of Down Payment Assistance Given

resource.description: This data represents the annual progress of the Little Rock Fire Department's Save-A-Life Smoke Alarm Program that puts working smoke alarms in the homes of Little Rock residents for free.

resource.name: Business Licenses
resource.description: Quick Export Link This dataset contains the active business licenses registered with the City of Little Rock. Anyone who is operating a business within the City of Little Rock is required to obtain a business license or privilege license. City of Little Rock Rental Housing Registration Program also requires a registered agent, which are also contained in this data set under real estate.
columns_description: Internal code used by City of Little Rock Treasury Division
Unique identifier for the type of license on file with City of Little Rock (BL - Business, AL - Alcohol, TL - Tobacco)
Name of the business on license
Contact person or entity for the business
Date original business license was filed with City of Little Rock

resource.name: Little Rock Police Department Statistics 2015
resource.description: This dataset displays Violent & Property Crimes that have taken place in the City of Little Rock. These are part 1 crimes which are reported to FBI. These numbers are subject to change due to reclassifying. Addressing is not provided on Rapes or associated items for victim privacy.
